name: Static Breadcrumbs
description: This component allows you to add a list of links that help visualize the location of a page in the application's hierarchical structure.

properties.name: options
properties.label: Options
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the data for the breadcrumbs. Array of objects returned by the handler will define the label, the corresponding page name and the page data.
properties.settingTooltip: Define the items of the breadcrumbs.

eventHandlers.name: onItemClick
eventHandlers.label: On Item Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the breadcrumbs item.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOver
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Over Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the mouse pointer hovers over the breadcrumbs item.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOut
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Out Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the mouse pointer leaves the breadcrumbs item boundaries.
